H0.text: They eliminate matter by taking nitrogen from the ecosystem is a primary role of decomposers in an ecosystem.

H1.text: They eliminate matter by taking phosphorus from the ecosystem is a primary role of decomposers in an ecosystem.

H2.text: They cycle matter by returning carbon and other matter to the ecosystem is a primary role of decomposers in an ecosystem.

H3.text: They cycle matter by returning oxygen and other matter to the ecosystem is a primary role of decomposers in an ecosystem.

A4.text: Decomposers are organisms that break down dead organisms and release the nutrients from the dead matter into the environment around them.

A5.text: Decomposers' activities lead to increased soil fertility.
